smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function print is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function toDateTime is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'CupsClient' with '14' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

Object 'IppTag' with '27' functions detected. Defined threshold inside objects is set to '11'
Class 'CupsPrinterDiscoverySession' with '15' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'CupsService' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: FunctionParameterNaming
smells.description: Function parameter names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Function parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: VariableNaming
smells.description: Variable names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

smells.name: MatchingDeclarationName
smells.description: If a source file contains only a single non-private top-level class or object, the file name should reflect the case-sensitive name plus the .kt extension.

instances.message: The file name 'EmumItem.kt' does not match the name of the single top-level declaration 'EnumItem'.

smells.name: ObjectPropertyNaming
smells.description: Property names inside objects should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: SpreadOperator
smells.description: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

instances.message: Using a spread operator causes a full copy of the array to be created before calling a method has a very high performance penalty.

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: url.openConnection() cannot be safely cast to HttpURLConnection.
connection cannot be safely cast to HttpsURLConnection.
connection.sslSocketFactory cannot be safely cast to AdditionalKeyStoresSSLSocketFactory.
null cannot be safely cast to KeyStore?.
intent.getSerializableExtra(KEY_CERT) cannot be safely cast to X509Certificate.
URL(baseUrl).openConnection() cannot be safely cast to HttpURLConnection.
view.tag cannot be safely cast to ManualPrinterInfoViews.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: ReturnCount

smells.name: CollapsibleIfStatements
smells.description: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

instances.message: Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.
Two if statements which could be collapsed were detected. These statements can be merged to improve readability.

smells.name: UnnecessaryAbstractClass
smells.description: An abstract class is unnecessary and can be refactored. An abstract class should have both abstract and concrete properties or functions. An abstract class without a concrete member can be refactored to an interface. An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.

instances.message: An abstract class without an abstract member can be refactored to a concrete class.

smells.name: UnusedPrivateMember
smells.description: Private member is unused.

instances.message: Function parameter is is unused.
Private property in is unused.
Function parameter button is unused.

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class PrintJob defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
The class EnumItem defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
The class Tag defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.

The class AppExecutors defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the package declaration and the list of imports.

smells.name: MandatoryBracesIfStatements

smells.name: LoopWithTooManyJumpStatements
smells.description: The loop contains more than one break or continue statement. The code should be refactored to increase readability.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in ("$username:$password") are unnecessary and can be replaced with: "$username:$password"

smells.name: ThrowsCount
smells.description: Restrict the number of throw statements in methods.

instances.message: Too many throw statements in the function checkPrinter. The maximum number of allowed throw statements is 2.

smells.name: ForbiddenComment
smells.description: Flags a forbidden comment. Defaults values are TODO:, FIXME: or STOPSHIP:

instances.message: This comment contains text that has been defined as forbidden in detekt.
This comment contains text that has been defined as forbidden in detekt.

smells.name: UnusedImports
smells.description: Unused Imports are dead code and should be removed.

instances.message: The import 'io.github.benoitduffez.cupsprint.CupsPrintApp' is unused.
The import 'android.view.View' is unused.
